Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Reroute at Milwaukee/Berteau
ShortDescription: #56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Milwaukee, Montrose, Cicero, due to street blockage near Milwaukee/Berteau.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Milwaukee, Montrose, Cicero then resume their normal route on Milwaukee, due to street blockage near Milwaukee/Berteau.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line and Loop-bound Brown Line Service Delayed near Belmont
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line and Loop-bound Brown Line trains are standing with delays due to track switching problems near Belmont. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line and Loop-bound Brown Line trains are standing with delays due to track switching problems near Belmont.

Shuttle buses have been requested from Howard to Linden provide additional connecting service through the affected area.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
